mapper.insert: insert into customers(cust_id, cust_name, address, cust_phone) values(${custId}, #{custName}, #{address}, #{custPhone})
mapper.select: select cust_id custId, cust_name custName, address, cust_phone custPhone from customers
select cust_id custId, cust_name custName, address, cust_phone custPhone from customers where cust_id like ${custId}
mapper.delete: delete from customers where cust_id like #{custId}
